meanings.sent1: The tiny flowers in the garden were so dainty.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dainty necklace that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The dainty kitten tried to carry the oversized toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her dainty footsteps echoed softly in the hallway.
meanings.sent5: The dainty teacup was fragile like a delicate flower.

meanings.definition: Finely made or delicate in design
meanings.sent1: The dainty lace on the dress added an elegant touch.
meanings.sent2: The intricate patterns on the vase made it look dainty.
meanings.sent3: The dainty watch was so delicate, it seemed like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her dainty handwriting was almost too perfect to be real.
meanings.sent5: The dainty jewelry was crafted with precision and care.

meanings.definition: Something pleasing to the taste or smell
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed an array of dainty pastries.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a plate of dainty appetizers for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The dainty aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She savored the dainty flavors of the exotic dish.
meanings.sent5: The tea party featured a selection of dainty treats for everyone to enjoy.
